member.name: T:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies
member.summary: An enumeration of built-in recurring event frequencies

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.None
member.summary: Indicates that the event is non recurring will occur only one time

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.Daily
member.summary: Indicates that the event will occur every day

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.EveryWeekday
member.summary: Indicates that the event will occur every week day (Mon - Fri)

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.EveryMonWedFri
member.summary: Indicates that the event will occur every Mon, Wed and Fri

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.EveryTueThurs
member.summary: Indicates that the event will occur every Tuesday and Thursday

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.Weekly
member.summary: Indicates that the event will occur every week

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.Monthly
member.summary: Indicates that the event will occur every month

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.Yearly
member.summary: Indicates that the event will occur once a year, on the month and day specified

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.EveryWeekend
member.summary: Indicates that the event will occur every weekend on Saturday and Sunday

member.name: F:Calendar.NET.RecurringFrequencies.Custom
member.summary: Indicates that the recuring schedule of this event is unique

member.name: T:Calendar.NET.IEvent
member.summary: An interface for creating event types

member.name: M:Calendar.NET.IEvent.Clone
member.summary: A function for cloning an event instance

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.Date
member.summary: The Date that the event occurs

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.Enabled
member.summary: True if the event is enabled, otherwise false

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.RecurringFrequency
member.summary: A value indicating how often the event occurs

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.EventText
member.summary: The name of the event

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.EventItems
member.summary: The list of items of the event

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.EventLengthInHours
member.summary: A value indicating the length of the event, in hours.

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.EventColor
member.summary: The color that the event show up in on the calendar

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.EventFont
member.summary: The font describing the appearance of the event

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.EventTextColor
member.summary: The text color of the event

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.Rank
member.summary: The ranking of the event that determines the order in which it is displayed on a particular day

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.IgnoreTimeComponent
member.summary: True if the time component of the date can be ignored

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.ReadOnlyEvent
member.summary: True if the event details cannot be modified

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.TooltipEnabled
member.summary: True if a tooltip should be displayed when hovering over the event

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.ThisDayForwardOnly
member.summary: If this is a recurring event, set this to true to make the event show up only from the day specified forward

member.name: P:Calendar.NET.IEvent.CustomRecurringFunction
member.summary: Set this to a custom function that will automatically determine if the event should be rendered on a given day. This is only executed if is set to custom.

member.name: T:Calendar.NET.CustomRecurringFrequenciesHandler
member.summary: A delegate for creating custom recurring frequencies
member.returns: Should return a boolean value that indicates if the event should be rendered on the day passed in
